price: (71) And there is none of you except he will come to it.[823] This is upon your Lord an inevitability decreed.
arabic: وَإِن مِّنكُمۡ إِلَّا وَارِدُهَاۚ كَانَ عَلَىٰ رَبِّكَ حَتۡمٗا مَّقۡضِيّٗا
footnotes: [823]- i.e., be exposed to it.  However, the people of Paradise will not be harmed thereby.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wa-in minkum illā wāriduhā kāna ʿalā rabbika ḥatman maqḍiyyan
